entities.name: Gertrude1
dialogue: So this be the lich's home? Cannae wait tae git mah hands on his prized ale!

entities.name: Gertrude2
dialogue: Getting tae old fur this adventuring.

entities.name: Gertrude3
dialogue: Dae you want a piece o' me? Come and git me!

entities.name: Chest
dialogue: Whit's this? Twa chests as soon as ah enter his lair? This is a guid omen surely!

entities.name: Key
dialogue: Tis pure dark in here... Is that a key? A'm sure nothing bad wull happen if ah juist pick it up.

entities.name: Door
dialogue: Locked?! Ye cannae lock me oot! Ah wull just burst though!!! Or... Ah kin find a key.

entities.name: Torch
dialogue: Maybe ah kin light that torch up with fireball... Or maybe that's what th' lich wants me tae dae!!!
